main.name: Sophie Hickey
main.description: I love to code and learn new technologies
main.bio: Hey, I'm Sophie! I recently completed a Diploma in September as a Full Stack Developer online with the Code Institute. My career background is with Financial Institutions and I am currently working as a Customer Account Executive at KBC Bank. I am looking to change my career and move into the world of development. I am passionate about Software Development and when I am not working I am expanding my software skills and expending my knowledge by building some amazing apps such as a Snapchat, LinkedIn and Spotify Clones. When I am not building apps I am working on creating and building websites using Thrive Themes.
main.bio_two: I have knowledge with Python, Flask, Django, JavaScript, NodeJs, Reactjs, Bootstrap, Material-UI, MongoDB, AWA, Firebase snd Heroku.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me for more information!

education.school: Dún Laoghaire Institute of Art, Design and Technology
education.description: Graduated with a Distinction (First Class Honours)

work.title: Customer Account Executive
work.description: Working on the AML department, my role complies of dealing with customer via phone and email to help them proceed with opening a new account. I request suitable documentation, review these documents and answer customer queries regarding their account.

work.title: Data Inputter/Administrator
work.description: Worked on a contract basis within two different departments, Wealth & Retirement PLanning and Bespoke Investments.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
